name: 李文亞
objective:
介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在烷、烯、炔類、芳香族與醇類相關的反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。

This course introduces the basic concepts of naming, structure, and properties of carbon-containing compounds. The focus of the course lies in the reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, chemical analysis, and instrumental analysis methods related to alkanes, alkenes, alkynes, aromatic compounds, and alcohols.
